name: Monks of the Timeless Garden
description: Some of the few who still guard the Garden of One Hundred Scents, the Monks of the Timeless Garden are known to frequent Cinderkeep and consort with the mad wizard Zephyrial. Now almost finished uncovering the details about chronomancers and their magics from aeons past, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
